docs.snippet: The teams traded the lead several times in the later stages of the game, but Wisconsin prevailed when Arizona failed to make a shot as time ran out....
docs.lead_paragraph: The teams traded the lead several times in the later stages of the game, but Wisconsin prevailed when Arizona failed to make a shot as time ran out.
docs.abstract: Wisconsin beats Arizona, 64-63, in overtime, to advance to the NCAA men's basketball Final Four.
